column5: We've all read stories on here of over zealous land owners and such harassing fisherman and hunters... Seems some hunters fought back!  Way to go to whomever did!  http://www.sootoday.com/content/news/full_...oryNumber=42174
good  maybe news of this will stop other stupid people from harassing us
In the charges there is no mention impeding hunting/fishing or something to the effect of that verbage.   Is it not an offense to impede those lawfully carrying out hunting or fishing activities?
Yes, but the charges laid hold a lot more weight. Also sounds like they were not quite set up yet (being close enough to a road to be driven at would mean they are not quite hunting yet).
How stupid do you have to be to mess with someone carrying a gun?
I guess Mr. Gravel is an extremist for the animal rights movement....

I beleive the same thing happened on Sat dec 4 1998 just north of delhi,ont(i think the year is right, the date definitly ).The mnr office in guelph will have a complaint report on the officer.What the mnr officer had to deal with earliar that morning, he had to to take it out on me.apperantly one of the locals tried running down one of the hunters as i was told, the mnr officer pulled everyone out of the forest.lets just leave it at that.
I have to agree with the Alabama nut case........LOL..........it really depends on the type of road, etc...........
yeah...we drive the roads and get out of the truck to shoot...generally
I will say, 'This is no Damned State'(one of my pet peeves with forms, GCD, etc.) LOL.
